creditline: Gift of Dr. Gabriel P. and Mrs. Yvonne M.L. Weisberg
description: two images printed on one sheet; left image: head and arms of little girl with the rest of her body buried in the sand; shadow of photographer, LRC; right image: same little girl with her torso partially uncovered from the sand; bare legs of three standing figures and child lying on his stomach in the sand, URQ
signed: on back of mount, in red ink: [Eve Sonneman 1968]
title: Sand Child, San Francisco
